quotes: Mr. Topbaş is the current Mayor of Istanbul and President of United Cities and Local Governments, and an expert in urban rehabilitation, social transformation and the management of the urban challenges faced by fast -growing cities.

quotes: The High -level Panel of Eminent Persons will be convened by the UN Secretary -General to advise him on a bold and at the same time practical development agenda beyond 2015.
